desc: Founded in 2016 by a small group of creatives from New York, London and Hong Kong. Serendipity grew from the wish to give people the freedom of expression through our international selections of contemporary designer brands.

layout.text: Lemaire Is A Breath Of Fresh Air
In an age when fashion has become seeped in logo-mania, Lemaire is an exception to what sometimes feels like an inescapable rule.
